name.th: อาจารย์เขียว วิญญาณนิรนาม

effects.name: Nullifier
effects.effect: Declare effect before 'Reveal Phase' of any player turn, If you use the effect and this monster must get their own Guilty Point on the turn, Refuse to get the Guilty Point.

name.th: หมีแยม ยอดนักฉก

effects.name: Swappadora
effects.effect: Declare this effect after combat phase, If your guilty number is at least more than 2 from opponent monster and you get another guilty point on this turn, You can swap the guilty point between yours and opponent monster.
